Posts.EditableText: Is there a way to make quest distinguish between a capital letter and a lowercase? For example, I have an object...a computer....and when you examine it, you get a menu. One of the options is to log on, and if you choose it, you are prompted to type in a password....Which is entered into a string variable...Now, can I make it that, say the password is "Me," you have to type in "Me," with a capital "M," and not "me." I saw some kind of function that said $ucase()$ or something like that. I experimented, but to no avail. Is this even possible?
